subject: Dear Friend.
body:
Dear Friend.
I am Mr. Steven Albert the director of Audit and Account Unit,international remittance department of United Bank For Africa Group. I am reaching you in regards to an investment I personally intend to do through my bank {United Bank For Africa Group} with your company considering your wealth of experience in this particular field.
I need your urgent assistance in transferring the sum of Twenty One Million and Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars ($21.5 million Dollars) immediately to any designate account under your care/custody.The fund has been dormant (in-active) for over 10 years in our Bank here (United Bank For Africa Group) without any legal beneficiary coming for it, considering the circumstance that faced the dormant fund without the next of kin.
I wish to let you know that this fund payment of $21.5 million legally and legitimately belongs to our deceased customer Mr. Andreas Schranner (the owner of the account) who died along with his supposed next of kin in the air crash on 31st July 2000. Ever since that crash incident, nobody has come for the recovery of the fund payment either as a beneficiary or next of kin to the beneficiary.
As a clerical account officer then to late Mr .Andreas Scharnner and presently the audit and remittance director to United Bank For Africa Group the bank has assigned me the authority to look for any available next of kin to late Mr. Andrea Schranner who would come over for the collection of the deposited fund urgently, otherwise they will confiscate the funds to the bank treasury. I don't want the fund to go into our Bank treasury as an abandoned fund; this is the reason I am contacting you. I want to front you as the legal next of kin and appointed beneficiary to the fund payment valued $21.5 million Dollars, so that my Bank will release the fund to you as the nearest person to the deceased customer.
I directly and personally have all the necessary back up documents and other necessary papers to support the successful release of the fund to you without delay provided you agree to work with me and strictly take my professional advice and official directives to actualize the fund to your/our custody. ( I intend to invest my share into any of the businesses that you can advise or your are into).  You can freely visit and browse the website below to have a better understanding of the crash and Mr. Andrea Schranner.
http:/ /news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/859479.stm
Please, I would like you to get back to me if you wish to handle this transaction with me or delete it if you are not interested. Upon receipt of your reply, I will provide you with necessary back up documents and further details to successfully actualize the fund to your custody without any risk involved. I would guard you with my professional advice and direct supervision. I have willingly agreed to share the fund with you in the ratio of 50/50. which is $10 million each. The extra $500,000 has been stipulated for all necessary expenses which we may incur on the course of process and recovering of the fund payment deposit into your nominated account custody.
Best Regards,
Mr. Steven Albert.

subject: Re:   Dear Friend.
body:
Hello Mr. Steven Albert,

I'm quite intrigued by your message and the opportunity you've presented. It's not every day that one gets an email about a dormant fund of such magnitude. I must say, it's quite an interesting situation.

However, I do have a few questions to better understand this scenario. You mentioned that the original owner of the account, Mr. Andreas Schranner, died in an air crash along with his next of kin. That's very unfortunate indeed. How did you come across my contact information as a potential next of kin?

Also, could you please elaborate on what exactly is required from me in this process? You mentioned that there are necessary back up documents and other papers needed for the successful release of the fund. What kind of documents are these?

Lastly, you mentioned about sharing the fund in a ratio and investing in businesses. Could you provide more details about this? What kind of businesses are we talking about here?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   This is my new resolution as I wait to hear from you.
body:
Dear Glenn,

First and foremost, I must thank you greatly for your readiness and willingness to assist me to achieve and accomplish this project/investing this fund deposit valued US$21.5 million. I have single-handedly worked extensively from underground to fix a lot of things officially right with the intention to gain success actualization of this fund payment to your custody without any risk involved.

THESE ARE MY NEW RESOLUTION:

1. Due to difficult restrictions and unfriendly long process and protocols in transferring huge amount of money from Nigeria to foreign countries, I have resolved with the bank to release this fund through International Certified Loaded Visa ATM Card, Which would be loaded with the money, processed and dispatched to your choice destination
address in Country.

2. My bank (United Bank For Africa Group) will be officially authorized through my office to process the release of the fund payment and officially/legally procure a United Bank For Africa Group International Certified Visa Card ATM where the US$21.5 Million will be loaded into. Once this is completed successfully, the fund loaded ATM card together with all the original hard copy transaction documents will be dispatched to your destination choice address in your Country.

3. When you receive the United Bank For Africa Group fund loaded ATM card, you shall confirm the authenticity and credibility of the United Bank For Africa Group internationally certified ATM card and you will be also to take the ATM card to any available Automated Teller Machine ATM to make a text withdrawal of some cash from the ATM card, this will give you personal confirm of its authenticity, credibility and validity, before the final activation of the ATM card will be carried out by the United Bank For Africa Group which will finally allow you access to huge cash withdrawals from your ATM card account.

4. To boast your confidence on this transaction and equally put off your fear/doubt on the credibility of this fund payment deposit. I will personally take it upon myself to cover most of the bills/charges towards the documentations, procurement and processing the release of the fund payment.

5. To clear the doubt and make our agreement standing, I hereby state my rule and the type of expenses I can directly cover towards the actualization of the transaction successfully: (A). I will pay for insurance charges, (B). I will pay for the all affidavit charges, (C). I will cover the charges and pay for prove of ownership certificate (D) I will pay for all necessary documentation and all supportive transaction papers/documents. (E). I will cover the cost/fee of anti-drug certificate, (F) I will pay for the fees on Anti-terrorist clearance certificates, (G) I will pay for the procurement of the United Bank For Africa Group international certified visa card ATM, (H). I will personally pay fees and charges for the loading of the fund $21.5000, 000 into the international visa card ATM which will be posted to your destination address.

6. Once all these steps/processes are officially, legally and successfully concluded I (Mr. Steven Albert), with the fund deposit US$21.5 million loaded into the United Bank For Africa Group visa card ATM together with all the original hard copy documents ready for dispatch delivery to your address, (DONâ€™T SEND ME MONEY, RATHER) you shall make provision of your DHL/UPS account to dispatch the ATM card/documents to your destination address. This is with view to stop your fear/doubt on the authenticity of this fund payment. I implore your honest and sincere assistance in whatever way you can to see success actualization of this fund payment, because both of us will immensely benefit from the business.

9. ON THIS NOTE: You will be expected to pay to United Bank For Africa Group (the ATM issuing bank) the ACTIVATION COST ONLY, when you must have received the fund loaded ATM card to your address and confirm it duly ok, by making a TEXT CASH WITHDRAWAL from any available ATM machine nearest to you. The activation will allow connection of your visa ATM card with your account deposit in United Bank For Africa Group to give you free access to huge cash withdrawals from the ATM VISA CARD. Remember the activation fee will be paid ONLY when all process, protocols, packaging and dispatch delivery of the fund loaded ATM card is delivered to your address and you make every necessary INVESTIGATION and proper VERIFICATION to confirm the validity and credibility of the fund payment ATM card. Furthermore you will be allowed to make Text Cash withdrawals with the United Bank For Africa Group Visa Card ATM from available Automated Teller Machine (ATM) to confirm that the fund payment is actually loaded into the ATM Card.

Once you verify and confirm this duly OK, then you will directly to talk with the bank as the legitimate appointed next of kin and legal beneficiary to the fund payment deposit valued US$21.5 Million via late Mr. Andreas Schranner (the original owner of the account) who died on air crash since 31st July 2000. Please remember the activation charge/fee will be send to the issuing bank (United Bank For Africa Group) as payment cost to connect your United Bank For Africa Group fund loaded ATM visa card with your account for onward access to huge cash withdrawals.

This is my resolution, which I believe will go on well with you. With this detail explanation, there is no hidden agenda whatsoever. I am legitimate and straight forward person who has a name and carrier to protect. Please digest this explanation/clarification very well and get back to me, if you are ready and willing to handle this transaction and conclude the investment with me, I will appreciate it so much.

View attached, the Deposit certificate, Death certificate and my working id for proper identification.

I shall also submit the Deposit Certificate and the Death Certificate to my bank on your behalf as your account officer which my bank shall also contact you in respect of that.

Kindly forward to me your full contact information for documentations.
Regards,

Mr. Steven Albert.

subject: Re:   This is my new resolution as I wait to hear from you.
body:
Hello Mr. Steven Albert,

Thank you for your detailed message and the information provided. It's quite an interesting proposal, I must say! 

I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about how the Certified Loaded Visa ATM Card works? I've never heard of such a thing before and it sounds fascinating.

Also, could you tell me more about the United Bank For Africa Group? How long have they been in operation and what is their reputation like?

Lastly, I'd love to know more about this project that we would be investing in. What kind of returns can we expect and over what period of time?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   Anwser to your questions.
body:
Dear Glenn,

I received your email, as regards to your email I have answered all your questions below.


(1) I'm curious about a few things though. Could you please explain more about how the Certified Loaded Visa ATM Card works? I've never heard of such a thing before and it sounds fascinating.

A prepaid Visa debit card is a card that is preloaded with a set amount of money. You can use it to pay bills, withdraw cash or make purchases.

(2) Also, could you tell me more about the United Bank For Africa Group? How long have they been in operation and what is their reputation like?

Serving Africa since 1949 Headquartered in Lagos, Nigeria, UBA has been providing superior financial services to small business, corporations, governments, institutions and individuals globally for over seven decades.

UBA provides corporate, commercial, SME, consumer and personal (retail) banking services to more than 27 million customers, served through diverse channels: over 1,000 business offices and customer touch points with 2,669 ATMs, 87,223 PoS, and robust online banking services.

(3) Lastly, I'd love to know more about this project that we would be investing in. What kind of returns can we expect and over what period of time?

As a citizen of a country I believed you know more in any lucrative investment we can invest on than me when you received the fund in your position then when I come over to meet with you in your country then we can join heads together to suggest any lucrative business we can invest our money that will also fetch us money in return, the most important thing now is to forward to me your full contact information for documentations and I have already presented the Deposit Certificate and the Death Certificate to my bank on your behalf as your account officer which I believed my bank must have contacted you in respect of that.

Regards.
Mr. Steven.

subject: Re:   Anwser to your questions.
body:
Dear Mr. Steven,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's interesting to learn about the Certified Loaded Visa ATM Card and the United Bank For Africa Group. I appreciate your time in explaining these to me.

I'm still a bit unclear about how the Visa ATM Card works though. Is it similar to a regular debit card that I can use at any ATM machine? And are there any fees associated with using this card?

Regarding the United Bank For Africa Group, it's impressive that they have been serving Africa for over seven decades. Could you tell me more about their achievements or any notable projects they have been part of?

As for the investment project, I understand that we will be discussing this further once the fund is received. However, could you give me a general idea of what kind of businesses we might be investing in? Are there any specific industries or sectors that you are considering?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   I wait for your urgent response.
body:
Dear Glenn,

I received your email, as regards to your question yes it is similar to a regular debit card that you can use at any ATM machine.

Kindly update me if my bank have contacted you in respect of the Deposited Certificate and the Death Certificate which I have submitted to my bank on your behalf as your representative and your account officer as it is my duty here to guide and direct you with what ever email you receive from my bank to avoid any mistakes.

Yes as for the investment project, We will be discussing this further once the fund is received by you, As what kind of businesses we might be investing in, I believed we can go for properties or rather you can search for any other lucrative business in your country we can invest in as you know I am a civil servant.

Please go ahead and forward to me your full contact information which will be use to secure other important and relevant documents in your name as the next of kin to late Mr. Andreas Scharnner. 

Regards.
Mr. Steven.

subject: Re:   I wait for your urgent response.
body:
Hello Mr. Steven,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. It's great to know that the card can be used at any ATM machine, just like a regular debit card.

As for the bank, I haven't received any communication from them yet regarding the deposit or death certificate. I appreciate your guidance in this matter and will keep you updated as soon as I hear anything from them.

The investment project sounds interesting. Investing in properties could indeed be a good idea, but I'll also look into other potential business opportunities in my country.

However, I'm not comfortable sharing my full contact details over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can secure these important documents?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   I wait for your urgent response.
body:
Dear Glenn,

I received your email which is well understood, but I have to assured you that your full contact information will be safe when send through the email as there is no other way you can send it without through the email and there is no way we can secure any documents related to this project without your your name and full address on any documents as the next of kin to the deceased, your full name and address must be on the documents because that will prove that truly you are the next kin to the deceased, you have nothing to worry about, your full contact information is safe with me in the email, Just go ahead and forward it to me so that every documents related to this funds can be secure with your information which is the right thing in anywhere.

Regards.
Mr. Steven.

subject: Re:   I wait for your urgent response.
body:
Dear Mr. Steven,

Thank you for your prompt response and reassurances about the safety of my personal information. I understand that this is a necessary step in the process, but I still have some concerns.

Could you please explain to me how exactly my information will be protected? And what measures are in place to ensure its security? Also, could you provide more details about the documents that need my name and address?

I'm sorry for all these questions, but I just want to make sure I fully understand everything before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   I wait for your urgent response.
body:
Dear Glenn, 

I received your email and as regards to your question, Once again I can assured you that your full contact information will be safe and protected once received through the email I can assured you that with my life.

Regarding about the documents that will need your name and address, there is what we called Letter of administration and what we called Fund ownership certificate which have to be secured from the court through a Lawyer and your full names and address must be on those documents and my bank must ask for this two documents because without this two documents my bank will not prove you the next of kin to the deceased and there are other bank approvals that will be secured through my bank with your full names and address and those bank approvals will be package along with the ATM card when ready to your doorstep.

So my dear good friend I advise that you forward them to me and you have nothing to worry about, I can assure you that.

Regards.
Mr. Steven.

subject: Re:   I wait for your urgent response.
body:
Dear Mr. Steven,

Thank you for your detailed response. I appreciate the reassurances about my contact information being safe and protected. It's good to know that there are measures in place to ensure this.

I'm intrigued by the process you've described, it sounds quite complex! Could you perhaps explain a bit more about what the Letter of and Fund ownership documents are? I'm not familiar with these terms, so any additional information would be helpful.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by 'bank approvals'? What exactly does this involve? And how does an ATM card come into play in this scenario?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   I wait for your full contact information.
body:
Dear Glenn,

I received your email and as regards to your questions, a letter of administration will stand as you are the next of kin to deceased which his name will also been in the letter and your name and address will be in the letter also as his new next of kin that has the power to received his funds and also the fund ownership certificate will also stand as you are the owner of the funds.

Then bank approvals means binding documents from the bank which contain above 10 pages and which are the instruments to your funds that will back up your funds when received and the fund will be loaded into an ATM card and the ATM card pin will be also send to you which you will use to make your withdrawal from the ATM machine when received.

I hope I have clarified everything to you now and I believe you have understand everything.
Regards,
Mr. Steven.

subject: Re:   I wait for your full contact information.
body:
Hello Mr. Steven,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I'm starting to understand the process a bit better now. So, if I understood correctly, my name and address will be in the letter as the new next of kin, correct? 

And about this ATM card, it sounds very convenient! But how does it work exactly? Will I be able to use it at any ATM machine or are there specific ones?

I appreciate your patience with me.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   I wait for your full contact information.
body:
Dear Glenn,

Your name and address will be in the letter as the new next of kin.

You Will be able to use the ATM card at any ATM machine.
Regards,
Mr. Steven.

subject: Re:   I wait for your full contact information.
body:
Hello Mr. Steven,

Thank you for your message. It's quite intriguing to hear about this ATM card and the possibility of being a next of kin. I'm curious, how does this process work? And why was I chosen for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re:   Don't bother your self.
body:
Hello there! I appreciate your message. Could you please elaborate a bit more on what you mean? I'm always eager to learn and understand new things.

Best wishes,
Glenn
